title: feDropShadow
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The feDropShadow SVG filter primitive creates a drop shadow of the input image. A drop shadow is effectively a blurred, offset version of the input image.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Applying a drop shadow effect to an SVG shape.
usageExamples.code:
<svg>
  <defs>
    <filter id="drop-shadow">
      <feDropShadow dx="4" dy="4" flood-color="#000000"/>
    </filter>
  </defs>
  <rect x="10" y="10" width="100" height="100" fill="red" filter="url(#drop-shadow)"/>
</svg>
